title: Western economies slow to react to crisis says leading economist
description: A top economist says western economies can learn from Asia as they face a severe economic downturn.
content:
Image copyrightGetty Images
The coronavirus was "taken a little more lightly" by western economies compared to those in Asia, says a former IMF chief economist.
Raghuram Rajan said western economies are facing a drop in economic growth by as much as 6% this… [+2388 chars]
